tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Teeth Ache,Teeth Sensitive to Hot and Cold,
review: First of all clinic is very clean and have a creative interior, so many up to date medical equipments are used here. very best environment for a world class treatment.my friend referred me to Stunning Smiles Dental & Hearing aid Clinica and when I met Dr.Vesta ,she is very friendly and  caring .Other doctors simply treat their patients with medicines but forget to do the most important thing which she does ‚Äì help them to move on with their lives with motivating words and inspirational thoughts. Thanks for everything doc.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Hey guys! This is Anand here. I've consulted Dr. Vesta for tooth fracture. Since from the day one she's has been very nice in handling patient and explains the issue in a simple manner  which a layman can also understand. She answers to all your problems and doubts without any hesitation. I've started RCT and gonna fix dental crown in upcoming sitting. I thought I can drop in a review after the procedure is over. I trust them and it made me to write now itself. Anyways I'll update my review after few weeks. If your objective is care and best treatment then you can blindly visit them for sure.True vfm. Thanks Dr. Vesta and team.

I was worried that I will have severe sensitivity while cleaning my tooth. But when Dr. Vesta did cleaning she  gently cleaned the tooth and she made sure that I have no discomfort while doing the procedure. She took one hour to clean the tooth. She was not worried about spending time with me. But she was more concerned only about my senstiviy issue. Highly recommended. Unlike other doctors she doesn't push the work if some one else walks in without an appt. Pl make sure u confirm the appt before u reach the clinic.

context: Post and Core,Crowns and Bridges Fixing,
review: I had a broken discolored front tooth. The dentist whom I visited told me there is no option fr treating the tooth other than extraction.He advised extraction followed by implants which was very expensive. I was worried about it.I thought of getting an second opinion and I found Dr.Vesta samuel from Facebook. I visited her . she cooly said there is no need to extract the tooth. I was surprised. Then she did a post and core and gave me crown which looks very natural. I am very happy and great full to her . Thank you doc. I would recommend this doctor for dental treatments in a better and less stressfull way.

For me dentist and dental chair means pain. The very thought of dentist scares me . That's y perhaps I was ignoring going to a dentist. After hearing abt Dr.Vesta from the internet, I had the courage to go meet her. I underwent 2 root canals. It was like a cake walk,compared to the root canal that I did with a mother dentist.There was no pain during the treatment.
The way she injected anaesthesia was excellent, I just felt the liquid going in.Earlier dentist use to give anaesthesia which is very painful. I truly admire her soft medical skills. Highly recommended fr painless dentistry.

Dr.Vesta is very good. On the top the clinic is excellent in terms of facilities and technology.I had a painless root canal from this clinic.I would say this is the best place for root canal treatment.There was no hurry for the other patients.She focused on what is beneficial for me rather than doing a root canal and taking some money for it,which is a trend in dentist doctors(corporates,multi speciality dental centres) Really thankful to Dr.Vesta. Its worth walking into stunning smiles clinic for a stunning smile.Would recommend her as a family dentist.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: Dr. Vesta is a person who still treats patients with utmost love and care , keeping in mind that being a doc is a noble profession. She handled my tooth so well took time to understand history and then suggested the best and cost effective way to addresd it!! Kudos and continue the good work !!

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review: I had been suffering from severe tooth pain caused by decay for almost a week. I had consulted Dr Lydia for tooth decay pain, she insisted to take a X-ray, then examined and suggested for root canal treatment as the infection was severe. It's a simple procedure she performed by first cleaning the infected area and  filling it with rubber like substance. The pain was quite bearable and she also saved my precious tooth from removal. My heartfelt thanks for her kind and positive approach.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I found Dr. Vesta on a google search and I wasn‚Äôt disappointed at all, so much so that I even brought my children for their root canal and crown treatment. She was very thorough and meticulous in her approach, taking her time explaining every little detail about the issues, which put us at ease. She was easily available on call outside of the appointments as well. Over all I had a very good experience with her as my dentist. 10/10 for her friendly demeanor, service and treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: The doctor provides total importance for hygiene. Most important factor is the doctor is not in a hurry. She spends time with the patients and takes care of them with total affection and care needed for senior citizens like my wife. Dr. Praveena, Dental surgeon is well trained to take care with least pain. I recommend the doctor for all senior citizens.

review: Hi guys i have visited dr.vesta .she is known for her conviviality, diligence towards her patient and professional .she explain the solution in a feasible manner and answers to all our problems and doubts without any hesitation .it is hard to find a doc like her .i am very glad for the service provided and the overall experience.i would personally recommend her as a family dentist  who has a efficient team to support  Dr. Vesta  - Thank You so much for the service doctor

Friendly and helpful. Took good care of my mother who is an elderly person. Good ambience and supporting staff.COST EFFECTIVE.Other dentists gave an estimate which is double the cost of what we paid in stunning smiles.I would highly reccomend this Dentist for all dental treatments.

Nice doctor. Gives lot of confidence to his patients before treating them. She takes time to explain us what she is  going to do and how v will feel about it... over and above she asks them shall I start .. very courteous. . The equipment used by her are advanced and uses very hygiene and latest methods..I highly recommend Dr. Vesta Enid Lydia for people who are scared of injection needles...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Firstly.. Dr. Vesta,  Thank You for giving me my smile back !!. 

I was little apprehensive to visit a Dentist - this never had any particular reasons neither in the past nor in the present associated. It may be due to a perception or whatsoever. Finally, when I decided to meet a Dentist, I surfed the internet to find a good dentist and came across Dr. Vesta's profile with glowing reviews. 

Dr. greeted me warmly, made me feel relax, understood my dental problems and started diagnosis. Dr gave a summary of the diagnosis - explain how the procedure is done .. Dr. was extremely caring and was making me at ease during the course of the treatment. 

I am very glad for the service provided and the overall experience. 

Dr. Vesta - Thank You so much.

I am  9 months pregnant all of a sodden in the night 9  had severe toothache 9 called many dental clinics but they did nert respond 9 called Dr.Vesta by 2.30 am in the night she accepted to come to clinic she exanined so greatful to the doctor 9 have never seen a doctor like this.......so good clinic

I was referred to the doctor by my friend went for cleaning as usually avoid dentist because to the modern approach to wards  teeth cleaning this Dr.was well organised and no fancy way of cleaning tooth was done she tooth her own time to finish the treatment highly recommended for cleaning the tooth

I had to replace my missing front tooth. As I was googling I found d doc in practo. I was surprised by the way she handled my case. It was excellent. Best place to do Root canals and crowns. I'm so happy that mybtooth looks very natural. She takes time to do it and makes sure its perfect....She never gives excuse...Highly recommended....

I had missing back tooth for past 4 years. I came to Dr. Vesta only for scaling. She explained me the importance of replacing it. Now I have replaced it with implant supported crown. She and her prosthodontic team has really done a great job.Now I am able to chew over well. Thanks to Dr.Vesta.

Amazing experience. I was bit nervous before coming to the clinic . But trust me the kind of expertise Dr. Vesta has is difficult to express in words. I did not experience pain during root canal treatment. Clinic location is accessible very easily. I would love to have my another cavity filled from this doctor.

I had zirconia crowns with Dr. Vesta. Since I had to replace front tooth I was worried about shade matching. But she did a wonderful job. No one could find the difference it was much better than my natural tooth. Decent charges and multiple options for the treatment. Highly recommended.

The friendliness and energy of Dr.Vesta certainly ensures that treatments are not a monotonous affair. Care is taken for the comfort of the patient.The availability of specialists for different dental procedures also ensures continuity of treatments without delay.The whole process is quiet transparent. And very reasonably priced.

Dr.Vesta treated me for a dead tooth and my mother for a tooth decay. She advised me on all the available options for replacement and left the decision to me.I finally went for a dental bridge. I was thoroughly satisfied with the whole experience. Once she is with the patient ,she spends her complete time with the patients performing the procedure patiently. She is extremely friendly person too. My mothers root canal also went well. Reasonable pricing and multiple options are available.

I went for extraction and I was sceptical about it and was very nervous and Dr.Vesta had made the extraction ease, she handled my case with immense patience as I was very uncorporative.I reccomend her for those who are scared of extractions, needles surgery. Very decent charges. A nother dentist charged me Rs.6000 for the same surgical extraction. But here in stunning smiles they charge on Rs.3000 for the same.

A very good level of service provided by Dr.Vesta. told me wht  treatment was required and went through reasons behind this. Costs also given. Would loved to have had all my treatment carried out however time in India was short so will be coming back for further treatment.

Got a couple of filling and crowns done. Drs are very soft spoken and gentle.they made me feel very relaxed during the procedure. I really appreciate the efforts put in. I will highly recommend Dr Vesta to all my friends and family and looking for dentists. I myself would com back if ever have any issues.

I had crooked teeth and I got it corrected from Dr. Vesta.Highly recommended because this is the 2nd time I'm wearing braces. The dentist who treated me earlier did not address the problem in correct way.They didn't even follow up my case after payment. But Dr. Vesta had a discussion with me before the start of the treatment and she clearly explained the course of treatment which other dentist fail to do. She is a non commercial doctor, I would  say this because other dentist will ask u pay the entire treatment cost in one stroke. But she does not collect money like that . First month we need to pay for the kit alone. From second month onwards we can split the cost as EMI. She and her orthodontist does a great job. Highly professional.

Great experience.Dr.Vesta is lively and kind hearted person that patient is bound to forget his/her toothache. Seen so many dentists but it has taken ages fr me to find a perfectionist like this female dentist in line with modern age technology..
I had never thought I am going to save my tooth . I visited stunning smiles clinic simply to ask the dentist  to extract my broken tooth. But she saved my tooth with Root canal treatment followed by apicectomy and capping without damage to my wallet. Whereas in a corporate clinic I was asked to pay Rs.24000 in one shot for the same treatment. But Dr. Vesta did the same for Rs.6000 in installments. Very economical. Highly recommended fr her perfectionism.
Vesta is extremely child friendly.explain the condition in a way which could be understood by everyone well satisfied with the treatment.
I like de clinic so much .. very neat n clean ... Doc s very friendly n caring .. Rates r very cheap compare to the other dental clinics .

review:
This is the second time I am getting a root canal treatment done with Dr. Vesta and I find it very comfortable here because she ensures minimal pain/ discomfort during the process and also she gives a very brief explanation of the issue and the corrective/ preventive measures to be taken during and after the treatment.
Also the payment was very flexible as it was structured over the various sitting through out the treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: ****** ** **** *** she appointing orthodontist on some in week days so the patience or unsatisfied with doctor. The patience are expecting there convenient day or time she refuses. If any doubts we are not able to contact the doctor. Because she wont pick up call and answer only by phone attender in the clinic. . *** ****** *********** *** ***** *** ** ***** This is my experience. So please kindly take your own decisions about this.
reply_text: We are sorry that you are unhappy with our appointment schedules. You keep disturbing me  by calling often after office time. I keep telling you to coordinate with the reception for the appointments. Inspite of that you want me to answer your calls  after my clinic timing. It's not possible for me to attend your calls all the time. But you very well know I keep you posted through text messages . Please coordinate with my receptionist for further appointments. Thank you.

review: I am ok with the treatment given. But the main issue is the mentioned doctor(Dr.Vesta) was not there in the clinic. It was attended by another doctor, who is typically a fresher. We could see that clearly during our treatment. It should have been mentioned.

I was very worried about replacement of my front  tooth. I was referred by 1 of my friend to this clinic. Doctor suggested immediate dentures. I was surprised by her approached. I was able to go to my job next day morning ( less than 10 hrs after extraction). Such a painless smooth extraction was done by the doc. My tooth was replaced within 1 hr of extraction. For hassle free extraction in and replacement of missing tooth I highly recommend Dr. Vesta.
